mapper.sql: talents_id, talents_name, user_id, talents_sex, talents_nation, talents_politice_status, talents_date, talents_education, talents_graduate, talents_major, talents_experience, talents_phone, talents_email, talents_resume, talents_info, talents_statue, talents_identity, talents_alipay, opr, opr_time, other, others
mapper.select:
select a.*, b.user_name as userName, c.key_name as talentsSexName, d.key_name as talentsNationName, e.key_name as talentsPoliticeStatusName, f.key_name as talentsEducationName, g.key_name as talentsExperienceName, h.key_name as talentsStatueName from talents_info a left join user_info b on a.user_id=b.code left join dics_info c on a.talents_sex=c.key_value and c.key_code='SEX' left join dics_info d on a.talents_sex=d.key_value and d.key_code='NATION' left join dics_info e on a.talents_sex=e.key_value and e.key_code='POLITICE' left join dics_info f on a.talents_sex=f.key_value and f.key_code='EDUCATION' left join dics_info g on a.talents_sex=g.key_value and g.key_code='EXPERIENCE' left join dics_info h on a.talents_sex=h.key_value and h.key_code='STATE'
talents_name like concat ('%',#{talentsName},'%')

select a.*, b.user_name as userName, c.key_name as talentsSexName, d.key_name as talentsNationName, e.key_name as talentsPoliticeStatusName, f.key_name as talentsEducationName, g.key_name as talentsExperienceName, h.key_name as talentsStatueName from talents_info a left join user_info b on a.user_id=b.code left join dics_info c on a.talents_sex=c.key_value and c.key_code='SEX' left join dics_info d on a.talents_sex=d.key_value and d.key_code='NATION' left join dics_info e on a.talents_sex=e.key_value and e.key_code='POLITICE' left join dics_info f on a.talents_sex=f.key_value and f.key_code='EDUCATION' left join dics_info g on a.talents_sex=g.key_value and g.key_code='EXPERIENCE' left join dics_info h on a.talents_sex=h.key_value and h.key_code='STATE' where a.talents_id = #{talentsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into talents_info (talents_id, talents_name, user_id, talents_sex, talents_nation, talents_politice_status, talents_date, talents_education, talents_graduate, talents_major, talents_experience, talents_phone, talents_email, talents_resume, talents_info, talents_statue, talents_identity, talents_alipay, opr, opr_time, other, others,code) values (#{talentsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{talentsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{talentsSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{talentsNation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{talentsPoliticeStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{talentsDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{talentsEducation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{talentsGraduate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{talentsMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{talentsExperience,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{talentsPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{talentsEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{talentsResume,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{talentsInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{talentsStatue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{talentsIdentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{talentsAlipay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oprTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{other,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{others,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update talents_info
talents_name = #{talentsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
talents_sex = #{talentsSex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
talents_nation = #{talentsNation,jdbcType=INTEGER},
talents_politice_status = #{talentsPoliticeStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
talents_date = #{talentsDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
talents_education = #{talentsEducation,jdbcType=INTEGER},
talents_graduate = #{talentsGraduate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
talents_major = #{talentsMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
talents_experience = #{talentsExperience,jdbcType=INTEGER},
talents_phone = #{talentsPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
talents_email = #{talentsEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
talents_resume = #{talentsResume,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
talents_info = #{talentsInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
talents_statue = #{talentsStatue,jdbcType=INTEGER},

talents_alipay = #{talentsAlipay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
opr = #{opr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

other = #{other,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
others = #{others,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where talents_id = #{talentsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
